basic_information.scholarship_name: Piyush and Lisa Patel Scholarship for Design

description: This scholarship was established in 2012 by Piyush and Lisa Patel to provide scholarship assistance to students within the UCO Department of Design who demonstrate proficiency and interest in web and multimedia design. Eligibility Graphic design major Cumulative GPA 3.25+ Junior or senior Proficiency and interest in web and multimedia design Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Design-Graphic Design   or SIS_Major is Design-Graphic Design   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Design-Graphic Design   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Design-Graphic Design
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Design-Graphic Design   or SIS_Major is Design-Graphic Design   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Design-Graphic Design   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Design-Graphic Design

criteria.description: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
